qas.question: What football club is Arsenal's greatest rival?
Since the Arsenal and Tottenham Hotspurs are geographically so close , what is the contest between them called?
What club has Arsenal have an increased rivalry since the 1980s?
What competition sparked the rivalry with Manchester?
What year's poll of supporters said that the Tottenham rivalry was greatest?
Who is Chelsea's biggest rivalry with?
A 2008 poll showed which team is West Ham United's biggest rival?
According to a 2003 online poll who is Fulham's biggest rival club?
In what year was West Ham United founded?
What are matches between Chelsea and Manchester United called?

context: Arsenal's longest-running and deepest rivalry is with their nearest major neighbours, <a0_0><b7_0>Tottenham Hotspur<b7_0/><a0_0/>; matches between the two are referred to as <a1_0><b9_0>North London derbies<b9_0/><a1_0/>. Other rivalries within London include those with <b6_0>Chelsea<b6_0/>, Fulham and <b5_0>West Ham United<b5_0/>. In addition, Arsenal and <a2_0>Manchester United<a2_0/> developed a strong on-pitch rivalry in the late 1980s, which intensified in recent years when both clubs were competing for the <a3_0>Premier League title<a3_0/> – so much so that a <b8_0>2003<b8_0/> online poll by the Football Fans Census listed Manchester United as Arsenal's biggest rivals, followed by Tottenham and Chelsea. A <a4_0>2008<a4_0/> poll listed the Tottenham rivalry as more important.
